allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(admin\): Michigan Civic Editorial redesign of entire admin portal

Complete visual overhaul of all 10 admin pages plus supporting
components to match the Buyer Portal''s editorial civic aesthetic.

Key changes:
- Created AdminPageHeader shared component \(Bitter headings, icon, actions\)
- Migrated all font-display \(Source Serif 4\) to font-heading \(Bitter\)
- Added font-mono \(Courier Prime\) to stat values, dates, IDs, table headers
- Replaced off-system Tailwind colors with design tokens across all pages
- Converted 5 custom HTML tables to DataTable component
- Added warm-100/warm-200 editorial surfaces to filters and table headers
- Added staggered entrance animations \(admin-stagger-1 through 6\)
- Polished sidebar: active nav accent bar, font-heading org name
- Updated overlays: EmailPreview and PropertyDetailDrawer token migration

Files: 20 modified, 1 created \(AdminPageHeader.jsx\)
Build: 0 errors, 1293 modules, 1.37s
EOF
\)")

Bash(# Check if there''s a skills registration mechanism — look for any skill manifest or registration files find ""/Users/travisgilbert/.claude/plugins/cache/claude-plugins-official/superpowers/4.2.0"" -name ""package.json"" -o -name ""manifest.json"" -o -name ""skills.json"")

Bash(# superpowers is NOT in the official plugins dir — it''s an external_plugin sourced from GitHub # Let me check if it was listed in the marketplace as external cat ""/Users/travisgilbert/.claude/plugins/marketplaces/claude-plugins-official/.claude-plugin/marketplace.json"")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(demo\): add SOP-killer demo features — Action Queue, Map, Audit Trail

Replaces the manual 6-tool compliance SOP with an integrated workflow:

- Action Queue page: groups properties by needed action, mail merge with
  template preview, batch send, and follow-ups tracking
- Geographic Compliance Map: Leaflet with enforcement-level color-coded
  markers, program filter, and property detail popups
- Audit Trail: per-property chronological timeline with search and pagination
- Mock data generator: 30 additional seeded properties with real Flint
  addresses, lat/lng, and communication histories
- Dashboard polish: prominent Action Queue CTA, expanded quick links grid
- Cross-navigation links between all new pages
EOF
\)")
